definition: important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: Our course deals with the essentials of management.
sentences.chinese: 我们的课程讲述管理的基本要点。

sentences.english: The optical unit and the electronic unit of measurement equipment are shown.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了测量装置光路部分和电路部分的技术要点。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the operative design and technique of human hand allotransplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨异体手移植的手术设计与技术操作要点。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the characteristics and its higy-yielding oultural techniques of "Chuanbei 1".
sentences.chinese: 该文主要介绍了川贝1号的特征特性及栽培技术要点。

sentences.english: First, the leverage is the whole point.
sentences.chinese: 第一，杠杆作用是整个要点。

sentences.english: Objective To study the nursing points of using semiconductor laser to cure early glottis cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨半导体激光手术治疗早期声门癌的护理要点。

sentences.english: Review all key points which are listed on flip chart .
sentences.chinese: 回顾翻转展示板上的要点。

sentences.english: What's the point of creating a header file with extern declarations?
sentences.chinese: 创建一个与外部声明的头文件的要点是什么？

sentences.english: Summerized the key nursing methods of removing the tracheobronchial foreign bodies in children.
sentences.chinese: 总结了小儿气管支气管异物取出术的护理要点。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the nursing care of patients with auto-immune hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨自身免疫性肝炎的临床护理要点。

sentences.english: Key technology and method to display serial processed DIB image is presented.
sentences.chinese: 着重叙述DIB位图连贯显示的技术要点和实现方法。

sentences.english: Each of these points needs to be considered when hitching an open source project to a corporate bandwagon.
sentences.chinese: 在承担公司的开放源码项目时，需要考虑上述要点。

sentences.english: Pig tail is a type of popularized food , the processing technology and key points of soft packaging pig tail are detailed in this article.
sentences.chinese: 主要讨论了软包装卤制猪尾的加工工艺及技术要点。

sentences.english: He only adverted to mine leading points of the arguments.
sentences.chinese: 他只提到一些争论的要点。

sentences.english: The purpose was to study the processing route and operating points of papier-mache Pteridium aquilinum processing.
sentences.chinese: 为了研究纸型蕨菜加工的工艺流程及操作要点。

sentences.english: He spoke without the Microsoft-designed computerised charts and bullet points.
sentences.chinese: 而他却没有谈及微软设计的电脑图表和要点。

definition: the key trick/the secret of success
illustration/diagram/graphical representation/to explain with the aid of a diagram
to take note of/to pay attention to
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
a trick/an ingenious method/know-how/the knack (of doing sth)
